items.description: Company founded with a mission to close the AI adoption gap for manufacturers.
Launched our ModelOps platform and expanded to finance and retail verticals.
Certified as a strategic partner by three Fortune Global 500 enterprises.
Opened Singapore innovation lab to support Southeast Asia expansion.
